vault.vaultDescription: Your Health Vault is a secure, encrypted storage system for your most sensitive medical information. Access your records, test results, and personal health data with complete privacy and security.
vault.onlyYouAccess: Only you can access your data

mood.title: Mood Checker
mood.description: Our Mood Checker AI helps identify your current emotional state and offers gentle, personalised suggestions to support your mental wellbeing.
mood.personalizedRecommendations: Personalized recommendations designed for how you're feeling right now.

shocked: Take a moment to process what happened.
Talk to someone you trust about it.
Write down your thoughts and feelings.
Take deep breaths to calm yourself.
Focus on what you can control.
worried: Make a list of your concerns.
Go for a walk in nature.
Focus on what you can control.
stressed: Turn off notifications for an hour.
confused: Research or learn more about it.
Give yourself time to think it through.

vitals.title: My Vitals
vitals.unableToLoadMessage:
The Vitals feature could not be loaded.

This may happen if:
â€¢ Health Connect module is not properly linked
â€¢ You are using Expo Go (use development build instead)

The app will continue to work. You can use other features normally.
vitals.errorMessage:
The Vitals screen encountered an error.

Please go back and try again.

The app will continue to work. This is a non-critical error.
vitals.fixInstructions:
1. Stop using Expo Go
2. Run: npx expo prebuild
3. Run: npx expo run:android
4. Or use EAS Build
vitals.healthConnectDesc:
To use the Vitals feature, you need to:

1. Install Health Connect app from Play Store
2. Open Health Connect app and set it up
3. Grant permissions to this app

The app will continue to work normally. You can use other features without Health Connect.
vitals.healthConnectNote: Note: Health Connect requires Android 14+ or device with Health Connect app installed.

about.title: About
about.tagline: AI powered health and wellness platform

offers.aiScreening: AI-based wellness image screening (tongue, nails, scalp, skin, eyes, teeth, posture, and X-ray image analysis)

about.fdaText1: HealNova is a health information and wellness screening tool and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. It does not provide medical advice and is not a substitute for professional medical judgment.
about.fdaText2: The FDA has issued guidance indicating that it does not intend to actively regulate certain lowâ€‘risk general wellness and mobile app software functions (often referred to as 'enforcement discretion'). HealNova is designed to fit within this lowâ€‘risk, informational category. For more information, see the FDA's 'General Wellness: Policy for Low Risk Devices' and 'Policy for Device Software Functions and Mobile Medical Applications' guidance documents.

disclaimer.title: IMPORTANT HEALTH NOTICE
disclaimer.subtitle: HealNova is a General Wellness Application
disclaimer.readCarefully: Please read carefully before using AI health features
disclaimer.wellnessDescription: This app provides general health information to encourage healthy lifestyle choices and wellness awareness.
disclaimer.notMedicalDeviceDesc: HealNova is not FDA-cleared or approved as a medical device.
disclaimer.notForDiagnosisDesc: This app does not diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or medical condition. AI analysis results are informational screening tools only.
disclaimer.notSubstitute: Not a Substitute for Medical Care
disclaimer.notSubstituteDesc: Always consult qualified healthcare professionals for:
disclaimer.emergencyText: If you have a medical emergency, call your local emergency number (911 in US, 102/108 in India) immediately.
disclaimer.emergencyWarning: Do not rely on this app for emergency situations.
disclaimer.accuracy1: AI results depend on image quality and may be inaccurate
disclaimer.accuracy2: Results should be verified by healthcare professionals
disclaimer.accuracy3: Individual results vary - this is a screening tool only
disclaimer.noDoctorPatientDesc: Using this app does not create any physician-patient or professional healthcare relationship.
disclaimer.agreementText: By tapping "I Understand and Agree," you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to use HealNova as a general wellness tool only, and you will consult healthcare professionals for medical decisions.
disclaimer.checkboxLabel: I have read and understood the disclaimer
disclaimer.exitMessage: You must accept the disclaimer to use HealNova. Do you want to exit?
disclaimer.checkBoxMessage: Please check the box to acknowledge that you have read and understood the disclaimer.
disclaimer.errorSavingMessage: Failed to save your acceptance. Please try again.

medicalDisclaimer.title: Disclaimer
medicalDisclaimer.generalWellnessText: HealNova is a general wellness application designed to provide educational health information and encourage healthy lifestyle choices. This app is NOT a medical device and is NOT regulated by the FDA or other medical device authorities.
medicalDisclaimer.notForDiagnosisText: HealNova does NOT diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or medical condition. All AI-powered health analysis features are screening tools for wellness awareness only.
medicalDisclaimer.notProfessionalAdviceText: Information provided by HealNova is for informational and educational purposes only and should NOT be considered professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
medicalDisclaimer.noDoctorPatientText: Using HealNova does not create a physician-patient or professional healthcare relationship between you and MatchBestSoftware Pvt Ltd, HealNova, or any healthcare provider.
medicalDisclaimer.accuracyLimitationsText: AI analysis results depend heavily on image quality, lighting, and focus. Results may be inaccurate or incomplete. ALWAYS verify findings with qualified healthcare professionals.
medicalDisclaimer.individualResultsText: Health information and AI analysis results will vary from person to person. We make NO guarantees about accuracy, reliability, or specific health outcomes.
medicalDisclaimer.medicalEmergenciesText: IF YOU THINK YOU HAVE A MEDICAL EMERGENCY, CALL YOUR LOCAL EMERGENCY NUMBER IMMEDIATELY. United States: 911, India: 102 (Ambulance) or 108 (Emergency). HealNova is NOT designed for emergency medical situations.
medicalDisclaimer.notFdaApprovedText: Statements and features in HealNova have NOT been evaluated by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA), Central Drugs Standard Control Organization (CDSCO), or other regulatory authorities. HealNova's AI features are NOT intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
medicalDisclaimer.thirdPartyServicesText: HealNova uses third-party AI services for image analysis. We are not responsible for the accuracy or reliability of these third-party algorithms.
medicalDisclaimer.limitationLiabilityText: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, MatchBestSoftware Pvt Ltd SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF HEALNOVA OR RELIANCE ON ITS CONTENT.
medicalDisclaimer.useAtOwnRisk: â€¢ Use at your own risk
medicalDisclaimer.useAtOwnRiskText: Any action you take based on information provided by HealNova is strictly at your own risk. You assume full responsibility for all decisions regarding your health and medical care.
medicalDisclaimer.consultProfessionalsText: For any health concerns, symptoms, or medical conditions, consult licensed physicians, specialists, or healthcare providers. Obtain proper diagnostic tests and examinations. Follow professional medical advice. Never delay seeking medical care based on app results.
medicalDisclaimer.emergencyCall: FOR MEDICAL EMERGENCIES, CALL 911 (US) OR 102/108 (INDIA) IMMEDIATELY.
medicalDisclaimer.acknowledgment: BY USING HEALNOVA, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTOOD, AND AGREE TO THIS MEDICAL DISCLAIMER.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: MatchBestSoftwares Pvt. Ltd. ("we," "our," "us") operates the HealNova mobile application (the "App"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use HealNova.
privacy.whatIsHealNovaText: HealNova is an AI-powered health wellness and information platform that provides:

features.screening: â€¢ Health wellness image screening (tongue, nails, scalp, skin, eyes, teeth, X-rays, posture analysis)
features.assistant: â€¢ Health information assistance (24/7 AI Health Information Chatbot)
features.insights: â€¢ Health wellness insights (PCOS screening, breast health awareness, lifestyle health factors)
features.mental: â€¢ Mental wellness support (AI Wellness Assistant)
features.diet: â€¢ Diet planning and calorie tracking
features.management: â€¢ Health management tools (prescription reader, medication reminders, mood tracking)
features.booking: â€¢ Doctor booking and health games

privacy.importantWellnessText: HealNova is a GENERAL WELLNESS APPLICATION that provides educational health information to encourage healthy lifestyle choices and wellness awareness.
privacy.isWellnessTool: â€¢ A wellness screening and health tracking tool
privacy.isEducational: â€¢ An educational health information resource
privacy.isLifestyleSupport: â€¢ A lifestyle and wellness support application
privacy.notMedicalDevice: â€¢ NOT a medical device (not FDA-cleared or approved)
privacy.notForDiagnosis: â€¢ NOT for medical diagnosis or disease detection
privacy.notSubstitute: â€¢ NOT a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment
privacy.notForEmergencies: â€¢ NOT for use in medical emergencies
privacy.notReplaceDoctor: â€¢ NOT intended to replace doctor visits or clinical evaluations

personalData.name: â€¢ Name
personalData.age: â€¢ Age and date of birth

privacy.healthInfoText: You may upload images for AI wellness screening. Images are temporarily processed and deleted by BytePlus after analysis. We keep wellness assessment results only, not original images.
privacy.howWeUse: â€¢ How we use your information

usage.provideScreening: â€¢ Provide AI wellness screening and generate personalized lifestyle recommendations
usage.displayHistory: â€¢ Display your wellness history and track trends over time
usage.sendReminders: â€¢ Send medication reminders and appointment notifications
usage.improveAI: â€¢ Improve AI model accuracy (using aggregated, anonymized data only)
usage.sendUpdates: â€¢ Send important app updates and security alerts

privacy.weDoNotUse: WE DO NOT USE YOUR DATA FOR:
privacy.noSharing: â€¢ Sharing with insurance companies or employers
privacy.noMedical: â€¢ Medical diagnosis or clinical decision-making

security.encryption: â€¢ Encryption: All data transmitted using TLS 1.3, stored using AES-256 encryption
security.infrastructure: â€¢ Secure Infrastructure: Hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS) with healthcare-grade security
security.accessControls: â€¢ Access Controls: Your data is accessible only to you through your password-protected account

privacy.doNotSell: 5.1 WE DO NOT SELL YOUR DATA
privacy.doNotSellText: We will NEVER sell, rent, or trade your personal or health information.
privacy.thirdPartyProvidersText: We share data ONLY with trusted service providers necessary to operate HealNova:

providers.aws: â€¢ Amazon Web Services (AWS): Cloud hosting, database storage
providers.byteplus: â€¢ BytePlus: AI image analysis, AI text analysis
providers.groq: â€¢ Groq API: 24/7 AI Health Information Assistant
providers.gemini: â€¢ Google Gemini API: Prescription analysis

rights.access: â€¢ Access Your Data: View all your health data within the app
rights.correct: â€¢ Correct Your Data: Update your information in Settings â†’ Profile
rights.delete: â€¢ Delete Your Data: Delete your account and ALL data in Settings â†’ Account â†’ Delete Account
rights.disconnect: â€¢ Disconnect Wearables: Disconnect HealthKit/Health Connect at any time
rights.optOut: â€¢ Opt Out of Model Training: Email contact@matchbestsoftware.com

privacy.dataRetentionText: Account information is kept until you delete your account. Wellness image analysis images are temporarily processed and deleted after analysis. Chat history is NOT stored. Deleted account data is immediately deleted from active systems, with backups purged within 30 days.
privacy.childrenPrivacyText: HealNova is NOT for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect data from anyone under 18. You must verify you are 18+ during registration.
privacy.internationalUsersText: HealNova is currently available in India only. Data is stored in AWS Asia Pacific (Mumbai) region.
privacy.noCookiesText: HealNova does NOT use advertising cookies, tracking cookies, Google Analytics, or any analytics tools. We only use essential session cookies to keep you logged in.
privacy.criticalText: HealNova is a general wellness application, NOT a medical device. All AI-generated health information is preliminary and may contain errors. You MUST consult licensed healthcare providers for any health concerns.
privacy.changes: â€¢ Changes to this privacy policy
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect new features or legal requirements. You will be notified via email and in-app notification. Significant changes require your acceptance.
privacy.contactAddress: Address: Spaze iTech Park, Sector 49, Gurugram, Haryana 122018, India
privacy.consentText: By using HealNova, you confirm that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy, understand HealNova is a general wellness application NOT a medical device, and consent to the collection and use of your information as described.
privacy.acknowledgment: By creating an account or using HealNova, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to this Privacy Policy.
